Question: Expressing his affection through gifts of cars, bikes, etc., this person's father was stern, and not emotionally open to his son.
Hints: The film was the first of three films teaming this person with Rick Moranis.
Former Nebraska Senator Bob Kerrey presided over the ceremony at this person's Los Angeles home.
This person wrote and starred in Shopgirl (2005), based on his own novella (2000), and starred in Cheaper by the Dozen 2.
